item.title: Whitney K + Torx
item.description: income tax refund presents Monday, 25 September Where: Sepulnke ~ Le West Doors: 19x45 Noise: 20x15 Vomitatrix (space noise grind/NY,USA) BNSU (heavy noisy duo/Berlin) stay tun-ed for further de-tails

item.title: Datashock + Pretty Lightning + Javier Areal Velez
item.description: income tax refund presents Monday, 18 September Where: Ekslepun Doors: 20x00 Start: 20x30 Datashock (west-geeerrrmini) ⁂ datashock.bandcamp.com Pretty Lightning (saaaaaarrrrland) ⁂ prettylightning.com ⁂ prettylightning.bandcamp.com Javier Areal Velez (aaaaarrrrrgentina) ⁂ javierarealvelez.bandcamp.com

item.title: Whitney K + Torx
item.description: income tax refund presents Monday, 11 September Where: TV Studio Ost Doors: 20x00 Start: 21x00 Whitney K (que? bec!) Konner Whitney rides in in our little town and graces us with a bunch of golden country greats off of his new album on Maple Death Records and a bunch of evergreens of yore ⁕ whitneyk.bandcamp.com ⁕ Whitney K’s Verknüpfungsbaum Torx (lei? pzig!) nu superdupergroup feat membaz off of ONYON and Bili Rubin - expect the unexpected
